Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[ti:Raindrops]

[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:12.85]Now another year has come
[00:15.54]Like the last and the one before
[00:18.56]I'm waiting in the cabin by the shore
[00:22.46]
[00:24.94]When the night comes crawling in
[00:27.46]Bells chimes and tamber ring
[00:30.59]I thought I heard you knocking on the door
[00:37.90]Hear the drops of drizzle time
[00:41.07]About the long gone fairytale
[00:43.92]I let them know my wish again
[00:46.95]
[00:49.12]Raindrops falling on the rooftop
[00:53.68]And again they bring up
[00:56.81]All the lone gone memories
[01:01.66]Raindrops falling on the rooftop
[01:05.91]I will never give up
[01:09.09]Hope I'll meet you here
[01:14.72]
[01:17.35]Last year I'm the one before
[01:20.19]In the cabin by the shore
[01:23.22]You gave mud hut chamber change the breadth
[01:29.67]Remember how we scratched the names
[01:33.27]In the tree right by the lake
[01:35.64]I went over to see if it's still there
[01:40.66]
[01:42.89]When you hear the bells from afar
[01:45.86]I'll be waiting there in the dark
[01:48.69]And send my wish upon a star
[01:52.03]
[01:54.15]Raindrops falling on the rooftop
[01:58.65]And again they bring up
[02:01.74]All the lone gone memories
[02:06.34]Raindrops falling on the rooftop
[02:10.84]I will never give up
[02:13.92]Hope that I'll meet you here
[02:18.01]
[02:19.84]Happy end of every year
[02:24.85]You will find me waiting here
[02:30.14]For you to come along
[02:34.55]Right down to the shore
[02:38.64]
[02:40.31]Ooooooh
[02:47.04]
[02:52.60]Raindrops falling on the rooftop
[02:56.84]And again they bring up
[02:59.88]All the lone gone memories
